entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regressions in System.Text.Json.Document.Tests.Perf_EnumerateArray #67176
  • System.Text.Json ObjectConverter does not handle reference metadata correctly on deserialization #67171
    7.0.0
  • Logging Source Generator fails with a InvalidCastException #67167
    7.0.0
  • `System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests` failures on `coreclr windows x64 Debug` #67164
  • `Libraries Test Run checked coreclr OSX x64 Debug` failing to unzip test assets #67159
  • fannkuch-redux-9 fails on many core computers #67157
  • [API Proposal]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 2/3) #67156
  • ReadAtLeastAsync(0) has different behavior between DefaultPipeReader and StreamPipeReader #67155
  • [wasm] Consider not AOT'ing `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.dll` to reduce resource usage #67153
  • OSR failure in System.Text.Json.Tests #67152
    7.0.0
  • Add support for Int128 and UInt128 data types #67151
    Future
  • Different Exit code when IHost stops from failing (async)IHostedService #67146
  • Random exceptions when calling System.Type.GetInterface #67144
  • [API Proposal]: Possibility to specify a custom naming for appsettings.json files #67142
  • Mono crashes with SEGV_ACCERR for P/Invoke in android Debug #67140
  • Resolving path to configuration files #67139
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricEventSourceTests.EventSourceFiltersInstruments #67134
  • Enumerable.Chunk throws OutOfMemoryException for very large chunk sizes. #67132

Closed

  • Skipping Json StreamTests.HandleCollectionsAsync test #35927
    7.0.0
  • Expression interpreter - Remove dead code #15440
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Specify supported custom type marshalling features on CustomTypeMarshallerAttribute #66121
    7.0.0
  • Attributes and Analyzer Diagnostics to support custom struct marshalling in the DllImport Source Generator #46838
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault when run by `execve()` with relative path #67127
  • [wasm][aot] `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn3.11.Tests` fail while linking due to OOM #66647
  • [wasm][aot] `System.Text.Json` tests fail while linking due to OOM #61524
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Fails to compile `.bc` to `.o` for `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn4.0.Tests.dll.bc` due to `SIGKILL (-9)` #65411
  • [wasm][aot] Fails to compile `.bc` to `.o` for `System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn3.11.Tests.dll.bc` due to `SIGKILL (-9)` #65356
    7.0.0
  • Add an (U)Int128 type #20640
    Future
  • Quarantine ReadAsync_WithAllowInputFormatterExceptionMessages_RegistersJsonInputExceptionsAsInputFormatterException #66590
    7.0.0
  • OSR stress failure in System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticsSource.Tests #67078
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: QUIC should have an IsSupported API #65802
    7.0.0
  • Suboptimal codegen for `default(SomeValueType)` #67116

PullRequests

Created

  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Xml` #67178
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1683074 #67177
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Regex.Tests: Disable test that tries to blow the stack, on AOT #67175
    arch-wasm, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [Group 6] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Configuration` #67174
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add \<para> tags to remarks comments #67173
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Allow caller-allocated buffer for `CustomTypeMarshaller` to be `Span` of any unmanaged type for Value marshalling #67172
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Reflection.Emit cleanups #67170
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix jit attach hang at Shutdown #67166
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [MAUI][PERF] Maui Perf add iOS Podcast SOD Tests #67165
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • System.Runtime no longer needs to enable preview features #67162
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • Support binding to immutable types #43662 #67161
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Change `CrossLoaderAllocatorHash` to not use the GC #67160
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Obsolete outdated constructors on Rfc2898DeriveBytes #67158
    area-System.Security, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • Use generic `Enum` methods in more places. #67147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67145
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix read of image_info while raising image_unload event #67138
    area-System.Diagnostics-mono, community-contribution
  • Add struct info to JitDump for INDEX and IND nodes #67135
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Design to support ByRefLike types in Generics #67129
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix a case of infinite retries while allocating at LOH boundary by constraining retries #67128
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Refactor HandleCollectionsAsync to an xunit Theory #67126
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Disable multi-level lookup by default #67022
    area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Expose the custom type marshalling types for source-generated interop. #67052
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update Ubuntu version names in the workflow docs #67169
  • PoC TLS resume on Linux client #64369
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Run the high resource AOT tests on build machine itself #67017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Avoid empty array allocation in MethodBase.GetParameterTypes #67149
    area-System.Reflection
  • Remove some array allocations from RuntimeType.CreateInstanceImpl #67148
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Infra for regeneration of third-party-notices file #60091
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [perf] Set job name for the performance jobs #67124
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.TraceSource` #66892
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate project files with the same name in different folders #64841
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Delete unused native code in src/native #67087
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Revert "[mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation" #67154
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #65089
    area-Build-mono
  • perf: Pass --dotnet-path to use dotnet-workload for wasm #66795
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix error reporting for objects with unsupported property types #67109
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Exclude throwinnestedtrycatch_il_r from Arm runs #67122
  • JIT: block some struct promotion for OSR #67131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable multimodule test #67137
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Stabilize summary blobs #67086
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add dynamic shim for SSL_CTX_set_options and SSL_set_options #67030
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Debug` #66862
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Add tighter bound to range check for matching Regex char classes #67133
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Enable CA1822 (Mark members as static) analyzer #66333
    area-Meta
  • Don't throw PNSE on QuicImplementationProvider.IsSupported #67036
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • [mono][wasm] Store the exception object in a GC handle while it is be… #67121
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Replace bool[] arrays with Span<bool> in XML deserialization #66914
    area-Serialization, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Update fabricbot instructions #67073
    area-Meta

Updated

  • [wasm] document marshalling internals #63885
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix race condition in loading assemblies with composite native images #67000
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [PERF] Added --logbuildoutput to microbenchmark runs. #67111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Publish crossgen as AOT if supported by the target platform #65948
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fixes #42643 allow keys with colons in JSON config #66886
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Try to fix a time-sensitive thread pool test #66765
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add metrics for caching #66479
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Fix static virtual calls to generic methods from gshared code #66739
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use ROS<byte> instead of byte[] where it makes sense on S.S.C.Cose #66741
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Managed implementation of NTLM for Android and tvOS #66879
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] improve I64 memory access #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debuger tests refactor 63667 #63730
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix NTAuthentication.MakeSignature/VerifySignature on Linux #65679
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Do not generate `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` nodes #66251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't apply IMAGE_REL_BASED_REL32 when address doesn't belong to current section #66855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Multiple enveloped signatures #67010
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Load R2R images on osx-arm64 according to Apple's guidelines #67118
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Improved error handling in debug proxy #65828
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Improve exception thrown when constructing SslCertificateTrust #66763
  • Perform reachability analysis before codegen #66967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [WIP] Refactoring and perf of reflection Invoke #66357
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Add support for creating delegates to static virtual methods #66936
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix KeepNativeSymbols to work on mono as well #66594
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Issue at most one connection attempt per request #67114
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Methods on primitives 65707 #66654
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Zip64ExtraField reads StartDiskNumber as uint32 #62959
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [debugger][wasm] ValueTypeClass refactoring. #63626
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Refactor suggested in 65842 #66821
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • Do not call into MsQuic inside a lock #67037
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Ensure serializer reflection-dependency sentinel is accurate #67104
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.5
  • Align API surface of immutable collections and their corresponding builder types #66550
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Replace 2 allocations from string.ToCharArray() with ReadOnlySpan in System.Private.Xml library #67002
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Optimize bswap+mov to movbe on xarch #66965
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
